QuestData.Title: The Tears of Elune
QuestData.Description: The Tear of Elune floats effortlessly, glistening in an ethereal pillar of moonlight.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the central teleporter in Dalaran and then place the Tears of Elune in the Portrait Room.
QuestData.RewardText: <Archmage Khadgar has set aside a space here for the Tears of Elune, as well as the rest of the Pillars of Creation.>
